Name: username
Description: User identifier of the resource owner

Name: nbf
Description: Timestamp which the token is not valid before

Name: permissions
Description: array of objects, each describing a scoped, time-limitable permission for a resource

Name: may_act
Description:
Authorized Actor - the party that is authorized
        to become the actor

Name: ace_profile
Description: The ACE profile used between the client and RS.

Name: cnonce
Description:
"client-nonce".  A nonce previously provided to the
        AS by the RS via the client.  Used to verify token freshness when
        the RS cannot synchronize its clock with the AS.

Name: cti
Description:
"CWT ID".  The identifier of a CWT as defined in
        [RFC8392].

Name: exi
Description: "Expires in". Lifetime of the token in seconds from the time the RS first sees it. Used to implement a weaker form of token expiration for devices that cannot synchronize their internal clocks.

Name: authorization_details
Description: The member authorization_details contains a JSON array of JSON objects representing the rights of the access token. Each JSON object contains the data to specify the authorization requirements for a certain type of resource.

Name: auth_time
Description: Time when the user authentication occurred
